name: Online Tennis
description:
Disclamer:
This project is extreeeeemely early in its development. This is pre pre pre alpha stuff. Expect major changes in both content and style.

How To:

Host starts by pressing "Start Host".
Client writes host public ip (WhatsMyIP?) in text box and presses "Start Client".
Host serves by pressing "Backspace". When game is over, ball locks in center of playarea and can be served again.

Move the paddle using Up/Down arrows or W/S
